track.name: Mathematics
track.descriptions: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.

primary_contest.description:
Code your way to infinity and beyond by competing in Ad Infinitum 18, a mathematics programming contest.

You’ll have 48 hours to solve 8 challenges.
primary_contest.name: Ad Infinitum18

model.python3_template:
#!/bin/python3

import sys

def rationalSums(n, a, b):
    # Complete this function

n = int(input().strip())
a = list(map(int, input().strip().split(' ')))
b = list(map(int, input().strip().split(' ')))
result = rationalSums(n, a, b)
print(result)
model.name: Rational Sums
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin", "r");
function rationalSums($n, $a, $b) {
    // Complete this function
}

fscanf($handle, "%i",$n);
$a_temp = fgets($handle);
$a = explode(" ",$a_temp);
$a = array_map('intval', $a);
$b_temp = fgets($handle);
$b = explode(" ",$b_temp);
$b = array_map('intval', $b);
$result = rationalSums($n, $a, $b);
echo $result . "\n";

?>
model.python_template:
#!/bin/python

import sys

def rationalSums(n, a, b):
    # Complete this function

n = int(raw_input().strip())
a = map(int, raw_input().strip().split(' '))
b = map(int, raw_input().strip().split(' '))
result = rationalSums(n, a, b)
print(result)
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

def rationalSums(n, a, b)
    # Complete this function
end

n = gets.strip.to_i
a = gets.strip
a = a.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
b = gets.strip
b = b.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
result = rationalSums(n, a, b)
puts result;
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    n_temp <- getLine
    let n = read n_temp :: Int
    a_temp <- getLine
    let a = map read $ words a_temp :: [Int]
    b_temp <- getLine
    let b = map read $ words b_temp :: [Int]

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
        let [
          n_t (read-line) 
          n (Integer/parseInt n_t) 
        ]

      (
        let [
          a_temp (read-line) 
          a_t (split a_temp #"\s+") 
          a (map #(Integer/parseInt %) a_t) 
        ]
      )

      (
        let [
          b_temp (read-line) 
          b_t (split b_temp #"\s+") 
          b (map #(Integer/parseInt %) b_t) 
        ]
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [N]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    A = read_array(N,"~d"),
    B = read_array(N-1,"~d"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
function rationalSums(n, a, b)
    -- Complete this function

n = io.read("*number", "*l")
a = {}
a_temp = io.read()
a_i = 1
for token in string.gmatch(a_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	a[a_i] = token
	a_i = a_i + 1
end
b = {}
b_temp = io.read()
b_i = 1
for token in string.gmatch(b_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	b[b_i] = token
	b_i = b_i + 1
end
